content: Dumb question (apologies): is there a stream for questions about the USCore implementation guide (https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/index.html)?
I'm wondering why some of the other https://www.hl7.org/fhir/v3/NullFlavor/cs.html options weren't included.
Trying to figure out what to map one of the SSA codings (Hispanic) to, in the https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/core/ValueSet-omb-race-category.html value set.
There is the #united states stream for USCore questions. As for Hispanic, would having that as ethnicity be appropriate?
Use #argonaut - that's where US Core discussions happen
